Album of the Year is the third album by The Good Life. 

This album is the 64th release of Saddle Creek Records.

The album is a concept record chronicling the rise and fall of a relationship. Each track represents a month (hence the title of the CD). The first track is April, and the others follow chronologically. The entire story is summarized in the first track, "Album of the Year." The main male character is dating a bartender, as referenced in the songs "Album of the Year" (She got a job at Jacob's/serving cocktails to the local drunks) and "Night and Day" (Night and day she tends to her bar/She pours the drinks, they pour out their hearts).
